Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

1.5 Coffee Groundss
1 Sugar

Vegan Recipe

Put water in teapot
Put teapot on oven on high heat
Put 1.5 x (1 tbsp) Coffee Groundss in small french press
When teapot whistles, pour water into french press up to silver line
Put top on french press
Wait 4 minutes
Press down french press slowly
Pour in cup
Spoon in level spoonful of sugar
